Research Control Panel

Use this tracker to log every deep research run. One deep research = one markdown file in the right folder with front matter.

Logging Rules

  • Place each run under the correct folder (economics, b2b partnerships, ai operations, inner game, kpi architecture, leadership culture).
  • Add front matter to every new research file, e.g.:
    ---
title: "FE Unit Economics Benchmark â€“ 2025"
module: "Economics"
tags: ["research", "economics", "FE"]
status: "raw"
lastUpdated: "2025-11-17"
---
  • Update the table below with a new row for each run.
